abstract: Phillip Alder Bridge column on deal played by USA-2 Venice Cup Team, which will compete in d'Orsi Senior Trophy world championship in Bali, Indonesia.
lead_paragraph: Carolyn Lynch, Mike Passell, Roger Bates, Garey Hayden, Marc Jacobus and Eddie Wold will be the USA-2 team in the d’Orsi Senior Trophy world championship in Bali, Indonesia, in September.

headline.main: Surviving a 5-1 Trump Break at USA Trials

snippet: Carolyn Lynch, Mike Passell, Roger Bates, Garey Hayden, Marc Jacobus and Eddie Wold will be the USA-2 team in the d’Orsi Senior Trophy world championship in Bali, Indonesia, in September....
